verses.text: And it came to pass in the four hundred and eightieth year after the children of Israel were come out of the land of Egypt , in the fourth year of Solomon’s reign over Israel , in the month Zif , which \add is\add* the second month , that he began to build the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft began…: Heb. built\f*

And the house which king Solomon built for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the length thereof \add was\add* threescore cubits , and the breadth thereof twenty \add cubits\add*, and the height thereof thirty cubits.

And the porch before the temple of the house , twenty cubits \add was\add* the length thereof, according to the breadth of the house ; \add and\add* ten cubits \add was\add* the breadth thereof before the house.
And for the house he made windows of narrow lights.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft of…: or, broad within, and narrow without: or, skewed and closed\f* \p

¶ And against the wall of the house he built chambers round about , \add against\add* the walls of the house round about , \add both\add* of the temple and of the oracle : and he made chambers round about :\f + \fr 6.5 \ft against the wall: or, upon, or, joining to the wall\f*\f + \fr 6.5 \ft built chambers: Heb. built floors\f*\f + \fr 6.5 \ft made chambers: Heb. made ribs\f*

The nethermost chamber \add was\add* five cubits broad , and the middle \add was\add* six cubits broad , and the third \add was\add* seven cubits broad : for without \add in the wall\add* of the house he made narrowed rests round about , that \add the beams\add* should not be fastened in the walls of the house.\f + \fr 6.6 \ft narrowed…: Heb. narrowings, or, rebatements\f*

And the house , when it was in building , was built of stone made ready before it was brought thither: so that there was neither hammer nor axe \add nor\add* any tool of iron heard in the house , while it was in building.

The door for the middle chamber \add was\add* in the right side of the house : and they went up with winding stairs into the middle \add chamber\add*, and out of the middle into the third.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft side: Heb. shoulder\f*
So he built the house , and finished it; and covered the house with beams and boards of cedar.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft with…: or, the vaultbeams and the panellings with cedar\f*
And \add then\add* he built chambers against all the house , five cubits high : and they rested on the house \add with\add* timber of cedar. \p
¶ And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to Solomon , saying ,

\add Concerning\add* this house which thou art in building , if thou wilt walk in my statutes , and execute my judgments , and keep all my commandments to walk in them; then will I perform my word with thee, which I spake unto David thy father :
And I will dwell among the children of Israel , and will not forsake my people Israel.
So Solomon built the house , and finished it. \p

And he built the walls of the house within with boards of cedar , both the floor of the house , and the walls of the cieling : \add and\add* he covered \add them\add* on the inside with wood , and covered the floor of the house with planks of fir.\f + \fr 6.15 \ft both…: or, from the floor of the house unto the walls, etc\f*

And he built twenty cubits on the sides of the house , both the floor and the walls with boards of cedar : he even built \add them\add* for it within , \add even\add* for the oracle , \add even\add* for the most holy \add place\add*.
And the house , that \add is\add*, the temple before it, was forty cubits \add long\add*.

And the cedar of the house within \add was\add* carved with knops and open flowers : all \add was\add* cedar ; there was no stone seen.\f + \fr 6.18 \ft knops: or, gourds\f*\f + \fr 6.18 \ft open: Heb. openings of\f*
And the oracle he prepared in the house within , to set there the ark of the covenant of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the oracle in the forepart \add was\add* twenty cubits in length , and twenty cubits in breadth , and twenty cubits in the height thereof: and he overlaid it with pure gold ; and \add so\add* covered the altar \add which was of\add* cedar.\f + \fr 6.20 \ft pure: Heb. shut up\f*
So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold : and he made a partition by the chains of gold before the oracle ; and he overlaid it with gold.
And the whole house he overlaid with gold , until he had finished all the house : also the whole altar that \add was\add* by the oracle he overlaid with gold. \p
¶ And within the oracle he made two cherubims \add of\add* olive tree , \add each\add* ten cubits high.\f + \fr 6.23 \ft olive: or, oily: Heb. trees of oil\f*

And five cubits \add was\add* the one wing of the cherub , and five cubits the other wing of the cherub : from the uttermost part of the one wing unto the uttermost part of the other \add were\add* ten cubits.
And the other cherub \add was\add* ten cubits : both the cherubims \add were\add* of one measure and one size.
The height of the one cherub \add was\add* ten cubits , and so \add was it\add* of the other cherub.

And he set the cherubims within the inner house : and they stretched forth the wings of the cherubims , so that the wing of the one touched the \add one\add* wall , and the wing of the other cherub touched the other wall ; and their wings touched one another in the midst of the house.\f + \fr 6.27 \ft they…: or, the cherubims stretched forth their wings\f*
And he overlaid the cherubims with gold.
And he carved all the walls of the house round about with carved figures of cherubims and palm trees and open flowers , within and without.\f + \fr 6.29 \ft open flowers: Heb. openings of flowers\f*
And the floor of the house he overlaid with gold , within and without. \p

¶ And for the entering of the oracle he made doors \add of\add* olive tree : the lintel \add and\add* side posts \add were\add* a fifth part \add of the wall\add*.\f + \fr 6.31 \ft a fifth…: or, fivesquare\f*

The two doors also \add were of\add* olive tree ; and he carved upon them carvings of cherubims and palm trees and open flowers , and overlaid \add them\add* with gold , and spread gold upon the cherubims , and upon the palm trees.\f + \fr 6.32 \ft two…: or, leaves of the doors\f*\f + \fr 6.32 \ft open flowers: Heb. openings of flowers\f*
So also made he for the door of the temple posts \add of\add* olive tree , a fourth part \add of the wall\add*.\f + \fr 6.33 \ft a fourth…: or, foursquare\f*
And the two doors \add were of\add* fir tree : the two leaves of the one door \add were\add* folding , and the two leaves of the other door \add were\add* folding.
And he carved \add thereon\add* cherubims and palm trees and open flowers : and covered \add them\add* with gold fitted upon the carved work. \p
¶ And he built the inner court with three rows of hewed stone , and a row of cedar beams. \p
¶ In the fourth year was the foundation of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* laid , in the month Zif :

And in the eleventh year , in the month Bul , which \add is\add* the eighth month , was the house finished throughout all the parts thereof, and according to all the fashion of it. So was he seven years in building it.\f + \fr 6.38 \ft throughout…: or, with all the parts thereof, and with all the ordinances thereof\f*
